summary: Highly organized and talented sales professional who effectively multi-tasks and balances customer needs with company demands. Efficiently builds loyalty and long-term relationships with customers, while consistently reaching and exceeding sales targets. Skilled in building relationships, negotiating and closing sales.

experience.title: Director, Compounding Sales Specialist
experience.description: Talented sales professional who effectively multi-tasks and balances customer needs with company demands. Efficiently builds loyalty and long-term relationships with customers, while consistently reaching sales targets. Exceeded sales goals. Monitored customer preferences to determine focus of sales efforts. Received numerous sales awards for most new accounts signed monthly and most dollars in revenue. Planned sales events. Presented PowerPoint presentations at events for professionals and the public. Trained new sales representatives on all aspects of compounding. Responded to all customer inquiries promptly. Maintained friendly and professional customer interactions.

experience.title: Healthcare Services Supervisor
experience.description: Build and design nursing division. Recruited and hired all professionals. Verified credentials and background checks. Made cold calls and appointments to local hospitals, nursing homes and doctors' offices to introduce service and build client base. Addressed client and employee questions and pricing.

experience.title: Branch Manager
experience.description: Managed all activities at the local branch, delegating duties as necessary. Made cold calls and appointments to local hospitals, nursing homes and doctors' offices to introduce service and build client base. Increased client base and revenue. Increased recruitment of professionals. Verified credentials and background checks on professionals. Increased client orders and staffed open positions with appropriate skilled professionals. Resolved problems in a timely manner.

experience.title: Staffing Coordinator
experience.description: Planned and conducted new employee orientation. Performed staffing duties including dealing with understaffing, refereeing disputes, firing employees, and administering disciplinary procedures. Provided information about policies, duties, working conditions, wages, opportunities for promotion and benefits. Developed, administered and evaluated applicant tests. Verified credentials, references and background checks. Identified staff vacancies and recruited, interviewed and selected applicants.

experience.title: Front End Manager/Cashier
experience.description: Counted cash, reconciled totals, supervised staff, and provided on-the-job training. Managed checkout stations, issued receipts and refunds, assisted customers and resolved complaints. Performed store duties and supported other areas as needed.

experience.title: L.P.N. Staff Nurse & PRN Charge Nurse
experience.description: Assisted nursing units including ICU, CCU and ER. Provided patient care, administered medications, started IV fluids, observed patients, charted changes and reported conditions. Worked with healthcare team to assess needs, plan and modify care. Supervised L.P.N.s, aides or assistants. Answered patient calls and assisted as needed.

experience.title: Receptionist
experience.description: Greeted visitors, directed to proper staff, answered calls, completed forms, compiled and recorded medical charts. Performed clerical tasks and transmitted messages or documents to appropriate staff.
